name: Halcyon Days
description: I'm a solo dev who learned unreal to make this game 4 years ago. I started this project 2 and a half years ago, and I didn't know if I'd be able to complete it. I intend on keeping up with bug fixes for at least the next few years as I'm sure people will discover things my game testers did not. Thanks to everyone who plays!
developers: Rock And Roll Gas Station Games
publishers: Rock And Roll Gas Station Games
